transportAdvice: The historic medina is best explored on foot, though its narrow winding alleys can be disorienting; the wider Gueliz district is also walkable. Petite taxis are widely available for longer journeys, and it is advisable to agree on a metered or fixed fare before departing.

weather.description: Cool and occasionally rainy with crisp nights, but daytime temperatures are pleasant for sightseeing.
Mild and partly cloudy with some rain showers, though sunny spells are common.
Warming days with a mix of sun and occasional showers, making it a comfortable time to explore.
Warm and mostly sunny with low humidity, ideal for outdoor activities and market visits.
Hot and dry with long sunny days; early mornings are the best time for outdoor exploration.
Very hot and dry with intense midday sun; shade and hydration are essential.
Peak summer heat with scorching afternoons; sightseeing is best done early morning or evening.
Extremely hot and dry, similar to July; the city is lively but heat management is critical.
Heat begins to ease slightly, with warm sunny days and more comfortable evenings.
Pleasant autumn warmth with occasional light rain, one of the best months to visit.
Cooler and occasionally wet, but daytime temperatures remain agreeable for exploring.
Cool winter conditions with chilly nights and some rainfall, though clear sunny days are frequent.
